      • AddFacultyGrade

        @POST
 @Path(value="/addGrades/{facultyId}/{courseId}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response AddFacultyGrade(GradesWrapper gradesWrapper,
                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="facultyId")
                                                                                                                                                                                   int facultyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="courseId")
                                                                                                                                                                                   int courseId)

        gradesWrapper - All the grades embedded to a Wrapper class object for the sake of input to REST API

        courseId - for which the grades are being added

        message intimating of successful addition
